mapper.select: SELECT experience_select_id experienceSelectId, traveler_id travelerId, experience_select_title experienceSelectTitle, create_date createDate FROM experience_select WHERE traveler_id = #{travelerId} ORDER BY create_date DESC LIMIT 0, 5

SELECT room_select_id roomSelectId, traveler_id travelerId, room_select_title roomSelectTitle, room_select_content roomSelectContent, create_date createDate FROM room_select WHERE traveler_id = #{travelerId} ORDER BY create_date DESC LIMIT 0, 5
mapper.update: UPDATE traveler SET traveler_pw = password(#{travelerPw}), traveler_name = #{travelerName}, traveler_PhoneNum = #{travelerPhoneNum}, traveler_email = #{travelerEmail}, traveler_career = #{travelerCareer} WHERE traveler_id=#{travelerId}
mapper.select: SELECT traveler_name travelerName, traveler_pw travelerPw, traveler_jumin travelerJumin, traveler_phonenum travelerPhoneNum, traveler_email travelerEmail, traveler_license travelerLicense, traveler_career travelerCareer FROM traveler WHERE traveler_id=#{travelerId}
SELECT traveler_id travelerId, traveler_pw travelerPw FROM traveler WHERE traveler_id=#{travelerId} AND traveler_pw=password(#{travelerPw})
mapper.insert: INSERT traveler ( traveler_id, traveler_pw, traveler_name, traveler_jumin, traveler_phonenum, traveler_email, traveler_license, traveler_career, create_date, update_date ) VALUES ( #{travelerId}, password(#{travelerPw}), #{travelerName}, #{travelerJumin}, #{travelerPhoneNum}, #{travelerEmail}, #{travelerLicense}, #{travelerCareer}, NOW(), NOW() )
